nodes.text: A nomadic tribe of Tusken Raiders lived in the Jundland Wastes desert of their homeworld Tatooine. In the year 32 BBY, the Tusken Orr'UrRuuR'R was part of the tribe and took part in shooting at podracers participating in the Boonta Eve Classic race as the vehicles passed through the Canyon Dune Turn.
At least one member of the tribe first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, which was released on May 19, 1999.
